title: Your Shop Still Broken
body:
Hi, 

I thought they were fixing your shop because it gave skins for champions you never played but now I opened my your shop and I only got one skin for a champ I actually play. And its unmasked Kayle. And its only 30% off. 

Please can I get my your shop fixed, it must still not be working correctly.

replies.body: The offers you have now are the ones that will be available for the duration of the shop. If you wanted some of the previous offers, hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can verify which ones you had and make that possible.
